summary: Lowbrow humor is the feature in this 'Porky's for girls'. The students of an elite international private school that teaches rich young women how to behave like proper ladies rebel against their strict, snobbish and brutish head teacher.
cast: Eva Gabor|Lu Leonard|Richard Paul|Carole Davis|Lar Park-Lincoln|Bader Howar|Barbara Rousek|Britt Helfer|Nathalie Tarkowski|Shelley Pielou|Yolande Palfrey|Robin McCallum|Eric Viellard|Igor Serdar|Jeremy Booker|Kader Boukhanef|Paul Venables|Vida Jerman|Boris Buzancic|Zdenka Hersak|Otokar Levaj|Bozidar Smiljanic|Nada Abrus|Katoum Sadik|Alex Cserhart
title: The Princess Academy
